feed.title: Stirling PDF Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Stirling PDF: 0.39.0 Memory cleanup and new APIs
entry.content:
Memory Cleanup (garbage collection) changes to improve memory usage of Stirling-PDF post operation

Added new API endpoints for users wanting to use stirling-pdf via their own scripts such as /api/v1/analysis/page-count and /api/v1/analysis/page-dimensions

What's Changed

Bug Fixes

  • Switch order of literals to prevent NullPointerException by @pixeebot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2769

Minor Enhancements

  • Update 3rd Party Licenses by @stirlingbot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2765
  • Update 3rd Party Licenses by @stirlingbot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2788

Translation Changes

  • Update and improve Czech(ÄŒesky)(cs_CZ) locale using Claude 3.5 Sonnet by @PeterDaveHello in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2748
  • Fix fr messages by @miniupnp in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2773

Other Changes

  • Bump org.springframework:spring-webmvc from 6.2.1 to 6.2.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2758
  • Bump bouncycastleVersion from 1.79 to 1.80 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2759
  • Bump org.springframework:spring-jdbc from 6.2.1 to 6.2.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2760
  • :globe_with_meridians: Sync Translations + Update README Progress Table + Update Verification Metadata by @stirlingbot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2786

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/compare/v0.38.0...v0.39.0

entry.title: New release for Stirling PDF: 0.40.0 Brand new Homepage!
entry.content:
Brand new homepage update! Please let us know what you think, For now we maintaining old homepage in parallel while we get people's reviews! Will delete based on feedback

What's Changed

  • Homepage update by @reecebrowne in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2663

Minor Enhancements

  • ðŸ¤– format everything with pre-commit by by @stirlingbot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2794
  • Posthog to log to log file by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2813
  • [Fix] Handle missing end page in PDF split range by @Abdurrahman-shaikh in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2816
  • Update 3rd Party Licenses by @stirlingbot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2810
  • Deprecated attribute th:include by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2827
  • Config rework by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2823
  • Update 3rd Party Licenses by @stirlingbot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2829

Docker Updates

  • Bump docker/build-push-action from 6.12.0 to 6.13.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2800

Translation Changes

  • Update messages_ja_JP.properties by @tkymmm in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2804
  • (i18n) Updated Irish translations by @aindriu80 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2793
  • Update messages_pt_BR.properties by @thiagoor-cpu in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2815
  • :globe_with_meridians: Sync Translations + Update README Progress Table + Update Verification Metadata by @stirlingbot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2811
  • :globe_with_meridians: Sync Translations + Update README Progress Table + Update Verification Metadata by @stirlingbot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2819
  • Update messages_it_IT.properties by @albanobattistella in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2821

Other Changes

  • Bump testdriverai/action from 1.0.0 to 1.1.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2801
  • Bump github/codeql-action from 3.28.1 to 3.28.6 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2802
  • Bump actions/stale from 9.0.0 to 9.1.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2803
  • Bump pdfboxVersion from 3.0.3 to 3.0.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2790
  • Bump org.postgresql:postgresql from 42.7.4 to 42.7.5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2757
  • :globe_with_meridians: Sync Translations + Update README Progress Table + Update Verification Metadata by @stirlingbot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2809
  • Update PR-Demo-cleanup.yml by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2817
  • :globe_with_meridians: Sync Translations + Update README Progress Table + Update Verification Metadata by @stirlingbot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2822
  • :globe_with_meridians: Sync Translations + Update README Progress Table + Update Verification Metadata by @stirlingbot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2830
  • Version bump by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2820

New Contributors

  • @Abdurrahman-shaikh made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2816

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/compare/v0.39.0...v0.40.0

entry.title: New release for Stirling PDF: 0.40.1 bug fixes for homepage and sign
entry.content:
Quick update for bug fixes in Homepage and PDF Sign Option to disable HTML sanitization for some advanced HTML docs in HTML to PDF

What's Changed

Bug Fixes

  • Homepage ui hotfixes by @reecebrowne in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2837
  • Fix tab container logic bug by @reecebrowne in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2840

Enhancements

  • VS Code Extensions for Development by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2826
  • added option for disabling HTML Sanitize by @carliblaz in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2831

Other Changes

  • Add newest dev by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2838
  • version bump by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2841

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/compare/v0.40.0...v0.40.1

entry.title: New release for Stirling PDF: 0.40.2 Bug fixes for compression and Pipeline
entry.content:
Lots of bug fixes for - UI - Compression (Thanks @Abdurrahman-shaikh for fix) - Pipeline (when OCR or HTML is used) - And lots of other changes!

What's Changed

Bug Fixes

  • Fix: incorrect setAttribute syntax for tooltip data-title by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2847
  • Fix issue #2842: Handle qpdf exit code 3 as success with warnings by @Abdurrahman-shaikh in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2883
  • Fix: wrong link picture_as_pdf change to img-to-pdf #2867 by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2869
  • Fixed firefox compatibility and added missing icons to feature pages by @reecebrowne in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2863

Enhancements

  • Add: Translation Support for Sort by: in Home Page by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2850
  • Add: Configurable UI Language Support with Dynamic Filtering by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2846

Minor Enhancements

  • Update sonarqube.yml and removal of gradle keys by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2866
  • Pipeline fix for some features missing documentation by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2882

Docker Updates

  • Bump actions/setup-java from 4.6.0 to 4.7.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2855
  • Bump actions/setup-python from 5.3.0 to 5.4.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2856
  • Bump gradle/actions from 4.2.2 to 4.3.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2870
  • removes remnants of verification metadata by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2884

Translation Changes

  • Update messages_it_IT.properties by @kmau in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2852
  • Update messages_de_DE.properties by @mjbohn in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2849
  • :globe_with_meridians: Sync Translations + Update README Progress Table + Update Verification Metadata by @stirlingbot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2860
  • Update messages_it_IT.properties by @kmau in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2861
  • Update messages_it_IT.properties by @albanobattistella in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2865

Other Changes

  • checks the compatibility of the licenses by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2844
  • Bump actions/create-github-app-token from 1.11.1 to 1.11.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2853
  • Bump crazy-max/ghaction-github-labeler from 5.1.0 to 5.2.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2854
  • Bump github/codeql-action from 3.28.6 to 3.28.8 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2857
  • :globe_with_meridians: Sync Translations + Update README Progress Table + Update Verification Metadata by @stirlingbot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2859
  • Create sonarqube.yml by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2862
  • Update sync_files.yml by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2872
  • Update screenshots by @reecebrowne in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2875
  • Update sonarqube.yml to remove depreciated cache feature (will update later) by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2885
  • Bump org.panteleyev.jpackageplugin from 1.6.0 to 1.6.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2851

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/compare/v0.40.1...v0.40.2

entry.title: New release for Stirling PDF: v0.41.0 PDF/A and many bug fixes
entry.content:
PDF/A conversion Reintroduced and lots of bug fixes for homepage, sign, add-image, pipeline and various others!

What's Changed

Bug Fixes

  • Homepage hotfix by @reecebrowne in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2894
  • Fix for tab issue by @reecebrowne in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2898
  • Fix issue #2511: Fix broken ZIP issue by adding zipOut.finish() by @Abdurrahman-shaikh in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2890

Minor Enhancements

  • PDFA fixes by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2896
  • pipeline bug, doc bugs, auto split new URL and doc by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2906

Translation Changes

  • Update messages_pt_BR.properties by @thiagoor-cpu in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2905
  • :globe_with_meridians: Sync Translations + Update README Progress Table by @stirlingbot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2907

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/compare/v0.40.2...v0.41.0
